DataElement.preferredName: More than One Smoked Cigarettes Per Day Average Count
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated response about the number of cigarettes they smoked, if more than 1 per day.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Greater Than One Smoked Cigarettes Per Day Count
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest exceeds another object in quantity or measure or value or status._The smallest natural number and quantity it denotes: a single entity, unit, or object._A question about an individual's cigarette smoking._A frequency rate of occurrences of something within a period of time equal to twenty-four hours._Determining the number or amount of something.
